# Changelog

## Previous Releases

### 0.0.6

add more functions to the validators

- for strings:
```js
max(number);
min(number);
length(number);

includes(string);
startsWith(string);
endsWith(string);

pattern(regex);
email();
phone();
// url();
// emoji();
// uuid();
// datetime();
// ip();
// date();
// time();

errorIf(errorConditon, errorMessage) // costume validation
```

- for numbers:
```ts
gt(number);
gte(number);
lt(number);
lte(number);

positive();
negative();

multipleOf(number);

safe();

errorIf(errorConditon, errorMessage) // costume validation
```

### 0.0.5

first release
